effect.x_y: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled. This ability has no effect in battle.

flavor_text.x_y: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
